title: Pixel 3a cannot connect to any network
content:
I bought my pixel 3a 2 weeks ago and had no problems until now.
Recently I noticed the mobile data from my sim card was not working and a day or two after my pixel stopped recognizing the sim card altogether. 
Now I can't even connect to wifi. It automatically turns off a couple of seconds after I start it.

Tried resetting the network settings, factory reset with no success.

After removing my sim card for an hour I was able to reinsert it and had cellular data and could connect to wifi for a couple of hours before it disappeared again.

What could be causing the issue and how to resolve it?
